description.plain:
Christopher Brent Wood (born September 19, 1995), better known by his stage name Brent Faiyaz, is an American R&B singer-songwriter and producer. He is based in Baltimore, Maryland.

His first single, “Natural Release,” was dropped on his SoundCloud. On September 19, 2016, Faiyaz dropped his EP A.M. Paradox; catching the attention of GoldLink. Just 2 months later on December 16, 2016, Goldlink collabed with Faiyaz and Shy Glizzy (Now Young Jefe) to create the behemoth single “Crew.”

On October 13th, 2017, Brent released his debut album Sonder Son.

body.plain:
Christopher Brent Wood (born September 19, 1995), better known by his stage name Brent Faiyaz, is an American R&B singer-songwriter and producer. He is based in Baltimore, Maryland.

His first single, “Natural Release,” was dropped on his SoundCloud. On September 19, 2016, Faiyaz dropped his EP A.M. Paradox; catching the attention of GoldLink. Just 2 months later on December 16, 2016, Goldlink collabed with Faiyaz and Shy Glizzy (Now Young Jefe) to create the behemoth single “Crew.”

On October 13th, 2017, Brent released his debut album Sonder Son.

songs.full_title: Fuck the World (Summer in London) by Brent Faiyaz
songs.title: Fuck the World (Summer in London)

description.plain:
The title track to Faiyaz' second studio album, Fuck the World.

The track is a fun prelude to the album as he flexes more of his newer, glamorous “singer/rapper” lifestyle along with the female troubles that come with. He’s essentially giving listeners a taste of the tone and content to come in this project.

I ain’t built like him

Just 'cause I fuck you, that don’t mean I trust you, I don’t

High hopes, baby
Fuck me crazy and I’ll tell you 'bout me
I was nothin' at all
Took a trip to London just to hear how they talk
Back to 410
You should hear how they talk
He might be Mr. Track and Field but I done ran through 'em all
Yeah that nigga play D1 but you still watch how we ball
I ain’t never home for long but you pull up when I call
All the hood niggas respect me
Strippers wanna sex me

Now he mad because you let me
If it ain’t fucked up don’t change it
I’d prolly be dead if I was basic
Would you still give me head if I had day shifts?
I work when I want
I do what I want
She get what she want
I call her my wishing wand
Wash it off when you top me off you know I be slumped

You got some high hopes

[Chorus]

Spend without a thought, we do it reckless

You said, “Baby don’t be mad, you know how Brent is”

songs.full_title: DEAD MAN WALKING by Brent Faiyaz
songs.title: DEAD MAN WALKING

description.plain:
Brent Faiyaz is bringing in his 25th birthday the right way with his new single “Dead Man Walking”.
The song describes Brent Faiyaz as a man living life on an adrenaline rush with no room for fear in the passenger seat.

He describes a carefree night of debauchery on the Vegas strip as he sings,

Dice rollin’ on the Las Vegas strip tonight. Slip that on, and we might miss the fight.

“Dead Man Walking” clearly shows that he’s nowhere near dying down.

songs.title: Trust

description.plain:
Trust is about standing on your own two feet and questioning your purpose in life.

The song blew up on Tik Tok with more than 440 hundred videos made from it, according to Tik Tok’s site.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vKr85RVN-sw
